overview.description: A comprehensive patient management system that revolutionizes healthcare delivery through mobile technology. This HIPAA-compliant application enables seamless appointment scheduling, secure telemedicine consultations, and digital medical record management.

techStack.name: React Native
techStack.reason: Cross-platform development for iOS and Android with native performance

techStack.name: Node.js
techStack.reason: Scalable backend API for handling real-time communications

techStack.name: MongoDB
techStack.reason: Flexible document storage for patient records and appointment data

techStack.name: AWS
techStack.reason: HIPAA-compliant cloud infrastructure with encryption at rest and in transit

techStack.name: WebRTC
techStack.reason: Peer-to-peer video consultations with end-to-end encryption

techStack.name: Socket.io
techStack.reason: Real-time messaging between patients and healthcare providers

timeline.description: HIPAA compliance audit, user research with healthcare providers and patients
UI/UX design focusing on accessibility and ease of use for all age groups
Iterative development with weekly demos to stakeholders and security audits
Comprehensive security testing, beta program with 500 users, App Store launch

testimonial.quote: This app has transformed how we deliver care to our patients. The telemedicine feature alone has increased our reach by 300%, allowing us to serve rural communities effectively.
testimonial.author: Dr. Sarah Mitchell
testimonial.title: Chief Medical Officer, HealthCare Solutions
